//// My best guess is a race condition between checkRx() and store_char().
//// Tested to replace MarlinSerial with HardwareSerial. Then i got missed chars at 250000bd - no 'hack' and no errors at 115200bd. That is the same with MarlinSerial without the 'hack'.
